price: 39. En jullie zal niets vergoed worden behalve voor datgene wat jullie plachten te doen.
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
